answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Pamela,
While the attached documents are not templates, they are nevertheless sample ordinances that the City of Mukilteo and the City of Issaqua Washington passed in 2008 & 2009 establishing interfund loan program and policy and 
procedures for such a fund.  The first attachment is the policy and procedures ordinance from Mukilteo and the second attachment is from Issaqua. I hope this helps.


Pamela,

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Town of Oro Valley, AZ is looking for information/copies of a template or interfund loan agreement that a city/town has submitted for Council approval to document a situation where one fund (i.e. Water Utility Fund) loans money to another fund (i.e. Highway Fund) for a specific amount with specific repayment terms including interest.  
Your time and expertise are appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Interfund Loan Agreement
